item.title: EP 19 - Pew! Pew!
item.itunes:title: Pew! Pew!
item.description:
Today we look at China's new laser weapon, whether or not autism is an evolutionary stepping stone towards a higher existence, and discover that the Despair Code has a physiological effect on people.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

China has recently announced that they will begin mass producing laser weapons for it’s police forces to use. Are we one step closer to fighting our alien enemies? Or will we be let down with this laser rifle just gives you a bad sunburn

Next, we take a look at a viewer submission: Is it possible that autism is an evolutionary step that will bring humanity to the next level in our development as a species. Who knows? I know, actually, because I read two whole articles on it!

Links:

China brings Star Wars to life with ‘laser AK-47’ that can set fire to targets a kilometer away

http://www.scmp.com/news/china/diplomacy-defence/article/2153310/china-brings-star-wars-life-laser-ak-47-could-set-fire

Autism: The Next Step In Human Evolution?

https://medium.com/social-club/autism-the-next-step-in-human-evolution-c22d8d9648be

Could Autism Be the Next Stage of Human Evolution?

http://blogs.discovermagazine.com/discoblog/2007/11/06/could-autism-be-the-next-stage-of-human-evolution/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
